nodes.bodyText:
Are we sure we want to completely remove the main menu?
I think this is ok, but since you removed the menu inflation, you should also remove the corresponding menu layout xml file.

This should not introduce a new field in the Constants file, instead you should get the key with getString(R.string.enable_watch_history_key).
It comes from this file, where all the setting key are stored (this is done to avoid bugs so we don't need to hard code every time):

  
    
      NewPipe/app/src/main/res/values/settings_keys.xml
    
    
         Line 174
      in
      0447e4e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <string name="enable_watch_history_key" translatable="false">enable_watch_history</string>
